nio/TCPStreamer.Output:
Notifies one signal for each received packet (up to 1024 bytes).
-   `data`: Bytefield of packet received
-   `addr`: Tuple of remote client's address and port
nio/TCPStreamer.Description: This block binds a streaming TCP Server socket on the selected IP address and port. Spawns thread to listen for new remote connections with a backlog queue of 1. Does not send responses to remote clients.

nio/TCPClient.Input: Upon receipt of any input signal this block will open a socket connection, send the message, and collect any response.

message.description: Message to send to the socket once connected.

nio/TCPClient.Output: This block will output a 'response' signal containing the response from the socket up to 8192 bytes.
nio/TCPClient.Description: This block opens a client TCP streaming socket on the selected ip address and port.
